EventStory.Headline: Edited Transcript of VSAT.OQ M&A conference call or presentation 21-Dec-20 1:30pm GMT
EventStory.Body:
ViaSat Inc Definitive Agreement to Acquire RigNet Inc - M&A Call
CARLSBAD Dec 22, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of ViaSat Inc M&A conference call or presentation Monday, December 21, 2020 at 1:30:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript

Event.eventTitle: ViaSat Inc Definitive Agreement to Acquire RigNet Inc - M&A Call
